n <-as.numeric(readline("enter a positive integer: "));
r <-as.numeric(readline("enter a postive integer: "));

n_error <-1
r_error <-1

if(n_error !=0) {
  if (n<0) { 
    print("enter a postive integer") 
  } else if (n==0) {
    return(1)
  } else n_error<-0
}

if(r_error !=0) {
  if (r<0) { 
    print("enter a postive integer") 
  } else if (r>n) {
    print("r must be less than n")
  } else r_error<-0
}

difference = as.numeric(n-r)
  
if( r_error==0 && n_error==0)  {

  #calculate n factorial
  nFactorial <-1
  i <- 1
  while (i <= n)
  { 
    nFactorial <- nFactorial * i  
    i <- i + 1
  }
  print(nFactorial)
  
  #calculate r factorial
  rFactorial <-1
  i <- 1
  while (i <= r)
  { 
    rFactorial <- rFactorial * i 
    i <- i + 1
  }
  print(rFactorial)
  
  
  #calculate n-r factorial
  dFactorial <-1
  i <- 1
  while (i <= difference)
  { 
    dFactorial <- dFactorial * i 
    i <- i + 1
  }
  print(dFactorial)
} else print("Please fix error(s) first")

Factorial_n_r = nFactorial/(dFactorial*rFactorial)

print(Factorial_n_r)
